definition: at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
lit. enemies on a narrow road (idiom); fig. an inevitable clash between opposing factions
to give oneself leeway (idiom)/to allow room for error

sentences.english: But the choices among such local email programs are dwindling.
sentences.chinese: 不过本地电子邮件程序的选择面却变得越来越窄了。

sentences.english: The narrow bandwidth property of a microstrip antenna is one of the important reasons to restrict its wide application.
sentences.chinese: 微带天线的窄频特性是限制它广泛应用的原因之一。

sentences.english: You have made my days a mere handbreadth; the span of my years is as nothing before you.
sentences.chinese: 你使我的年日，窄如手掌。

sentences.english: There are light passages, narrow ones in all different depth, like underground tunnels in limestone.
sentences.chinese: 有宽有窄，形态各异，就像是石灰岩的地下隧道。

sentences.english: Hip, edgy jeans make him think you're too cool for school.
sentences.chinese: 低腰的窄脚牛仔裤会让他觉得你太过前卫。

sentences.english: Narrow-gap materials such as InSb have the requisite high mobility.
sentences.chinese: 锑化铟之类的窄能隙材料有我们要的高迁移率。

sentences.english: He wedged himself through the narrow crack.
sentences.chinese: 他从那窄缝中挤了过去。

sentences.english: If valley flashings are too narrow, backed-up water can find its way under the roofing materials.
sentences.chinese: 如果天沟过于窄的话，积水将渗透屋面材料。

sentences.english: HMX with nanometer particle size and narrow particle distribution was successfully prepared by impinging method.
sentences.chinese: 通过撞击法成功地制备出了窄分布的纳米级HMX。

sentences.english: Edinburgh city is small, narrow streets, ancient buildings.
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的古城很小，窄的街道，古老的建筑。

sentences.english: Ever narrower, it was ever more difficult to climb, and Faldan started to feel very tired.
sentences.chinese: 越走越窄，也更难往上爬，福达开始感到很疲惫。

sentences.english: A high stiff collar framed his narrow face.
sentences.chinese: 高高的硬领衬着他的窄脸。

sentences.english: The rock body is in a simple shape narrowing eastward.
sentences.chinese: 岩体形态简单，西宽东窄。

sentences.english: The exact formulae of the acoustical impedance of a narrow slit and its low-frequency approximation are available.
sentences.chinese: 窄缝的声阻抗严格公式以及低频近似公式都存在。

sentences.english: Prominent in the raceway surface and rolling direction parallel to the narrow shroud.
sentences.chinese: 突出于滚道表面与滚动方向平行的窄凸肩。

sentences.english: The paper gives the design of the narrow pitch and lower stubble cutting apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 据此提出了窄节距低割茬切割器的设计依据。
